lead_paragraph: KUIBYSHEV, Russia, April 30 -- At a press conference after his re turn from Moscow today, United States Ambassador William H. Standley described an hour-and-a-half interview he had with Premier Joseph Stalin in the office of Foreign Commissar Vyacheslaff M. Molotoff in the Kremlin.
abstract: U S Amb Standley repts on conf with Stalin on U S supplies aid
